channel.title: Germany on Arjen's travels
channel.description: Recent content in Germany on Arjen's travels

item.title: Weekend with Friends
item.description: 14 Oct 2011 until 16 Oct 2011 As I’m writing this first part I’ve reached the fifth hour of a train ride to Koblenz, Germany. Not where I expected this weekend to take place, but so far it’s interesting. So, how did I end up in this train ride? Months ago, after I’d announced my travel plans, three of my best friends; Jan, Merijn, and Steven asked to keep the weekend of October 14 till 16 free so we could do something fun.
